subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh’s Marc-Andre Fleury stopped 32 shots Wednesday in a shutout win over Tampa Bay in Game 1 of their N.H.L. first-round playoff series.
snippet: Pittsburgh’s Marc-Andre Fleury stopped 32 shots Wednesday in a shutout win over Tampa Bay in Game 1 of their N.H.L. first-round playoff series.
